verses.text: \w What|strong="G5101"\w* \w then|strong="G3767"\w* \w shall|strong="G5101"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w* \w say|strong="G3004"\w* \w that|strong="G3588"\w* Abraham, \w our|strong="G2596"\w* \w forefather|strong="G3962"\w*, \w has|strong="G3962"\w* discovered?

\w If|strong="G1487"\w* Abraham \w was|strong="G2316"\w* \w indeed|strong="G1063"\w* \w justified|strong="G1344"\w* \w by|strong="G1537"\w* \w works|strong="G2041"\w*, \w he|strong="G1063"\w* \w had|strong="G2192"\w* \w something|strong="G2745"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w boast|strong="G2745"\w* \w about|strong="G4314"\w*, \w but|strong="G1487"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w before|strong="G4314"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w what|strong="G5101"\w* \w does|strong="G5101"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Scripture|strong="G1124"\w* \w say|strong="G3004"\w*? “\w Abraham|strong="G4100"\w* \w believed|strong="G4100"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w it|strong="G2532"\w* \w was|strong="G3588"\w* \w credited|strong="G3049"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w* \w as|strong="G1519"\w* \w righteousness|strong="G1343"\w*.”\f + \fr 4:3 \ft Genesis 15:6\f*

\w Now|strong="G1161"\w* \w the|strong="G1161"\w* \w wages|strong="G3408"\w* \w of|strong="G5485"\w* \w the|strong="G1161"\w* worker \w are|strong="G3588"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w credited|strong="G3049"\w* \w as|strong="G1161"\w* \w a|strong="G1161"\w* \w gift|strong="G5485"\w*, \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w as|strong="G1161"\w* \w an|strong="G1161"\w* obligation.

\w However|strong="G1161"\w*, \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G1519"\w* \w one|strong="G3588"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w does|strong="G2038"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w work|strong="G2038"\w*, \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w believes|strong="G4100"\w* \w in|strong="G1519"\w* \w Him|strong="G3588"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w justifies|strong="G1344"\w* \w the|strong="G1519"\w* \w wicked|strong="G3588"\w*, \w his|strong="G1519"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w credited|strong="G3049"\w* \w as|strong="G1519"\w* \w righteousness|strong="G1343"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w David|strong="G1138"\w* \w speaks|strong="G3004"\w* \w likewise|strong="G2532"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w blessedness|strong="G3108"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w man|strong="G3739"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w credits|strong="G3049"\w* \w righteousness|strong="G1343"\w* \w apart|strong="G5565"\w* \w from|strong="G2532"\w* \w works|strong="G2041"\w*:

“\w Blessed|strong="G3107"\w* \w are|strong="G3588"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w whose|strong="G3739"\w* lawless acts \w are|strong="G3588"\w* forgiven, \w whose|strong="G3739"\w* sins \w are|strong="G3588"\w* \w covered|strong="G1943"\w*.

\w Blessed|strong="G3107"\w* \w is|strong="G3739"\w* \w the|strong="G3739"\w* \w man|strong="G3361"\w* \w whose|strong="G3739"\w* sin \w the|strong="G3739"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w will|strong="G3739"\w* \w never|strong="G3756"\w* \w count|strong="G3049"\w* \w against|strong="G3361"\w* \w him|strong="G3739"\w*.”\f + \fr 4:8 \ft Psalms 32:1–2 (see also LXX)\f*

\w Is|strong="G3588"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w blessing|strong="G3108"\w* \w only|strong="G2532"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w circumcised|strong="G4061"\w*, \w or|strong="G2228"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* uncircumcised? \w We|strong="G1063"\w* \w have|strong="G2532"\w* \w been|strong="G2532"\w* \w saying|strong="G3004"\w* \w that|strong="G3588"\w* Abraham’s \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* \w was|strong="G3588"\w* \w credited|strong="G3049"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w* \w as|strong="G1519"\w* \w righteousness|strong="G1343"\w*.

\w In|strong="G1722"\w* \w what|strong="G4459"\w* context \w was|strong="G1510"\w* \w it|strong="G1510"\w* \w credited|strong="G3049"\w*? \w Was|strong="G1510"\w* \w it|strong="G1510"\w* \w after|strong="G1722"\w* \w his|strong="G1722"\w* \w circumcision|strong="G4061"\w*, \w or|strong="G2228"\w* \w before|strong="G1722"\w*? \w It|strong="G1510"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w after|strong="G1722"\w*, \w but|strong="G3767"\w* \w before|strong="G1722"\w*.\f + \fr 4:10 \ft Literally How then was it reckoned—being in circumcision, or in uncircumcision? Not in circumcision, but in uncircumcision.\f*

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w received|strong="G2983"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w sign|strong="G4592"\w* \w of|strong="G1223"\w* \w circumcision|strong="G4061"\w* \w as|strong="G1519"\w* \w a|strong="G2532"\w* \w seal|strong="G4973"\w* \w of|strong="G1223"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w righteousness|strong="G1343"\w* \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w had|strong="G2532"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* \w while|strong="G1722"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* still uncircumcised. \w So|strong="G2532"\w* \w then|strong="G2532"\w*, \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w father|strong="G3962"\w* \w of|strong="G1223"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w believe|strong="G4100"\w* \w but|strong="G2532"\w* \w are|strong="G1510"\w* \w not|strong="G1510"\w* \w circumcised|strong="G4061"\w*, \w in|strong="G1722"\w* order \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w righteousness|strong="G1343"\w* \w might|strong="G2532"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* \w credited|strong="G3049"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w father|strong="G3962"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w circumcised|strong="G4061"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w only|strong="G3440"\w* \w are|strong="G3588"\w* \w circumcised|strong="G4061"\w*, \w but|strong="G2532"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w walk|strong="G4748"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* footsteps \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w our|strong="G2532"\w* \w father|strong="G3962"\w* Abraham \w had|strong="G2532"\w* \w before|strong="G1722"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w was|strong="G3588"\w* \w circumcised|strong="G4061"\w*. Abraham Receives the Promise (Genesis 15:8–21)

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w the|strong="G1223"\w* \w promise|strong="G1860"\w* \w to|strong="G3756"\w* Abraham \w and|strong="G4102"\w* \w his|strong="G1223"\w* offspring \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w he|strong="G3588"\w* \w would|strong="G1510"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* \w heir|strong="G2818"\w* \w of|strong="G1223"\w* \w the|strong="G1223"\w* \w world|strong="G2889"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* given \w through|strong="G1223"\w* \w the|strong="G1223"\w* \w law|strong="G3551"\w*, \w but|strong="G1063"\w* \w through|strong="G1223"\w* \w the|strong="G1223"\w* \w righteousness|strong="G1343"\w* \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w comes|strong="G1510"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w* \w those|strong="G3588"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w live|strong="G2532"\w* \w by|strong="G1537"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w law|strong="G3551"\w* \w are|strong="G3588"\w* \w heirs|strong="G2818"\w*, \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* useless \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w promise|strong="G1860"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* worthless,

\w because|strong="G1063"\w* \w the|strong="G1161"\w* \w law|strong="G3551"\w* \w brings|strong="G2716"\w* \w wrath|strong="G3709"\w*. \w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w where|strong="G3757"\w* \w there|strong="G1161"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* \w law|strong="G3551"\w*, \w there|strong="G1161"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* \w transgression|strong="G3847"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="G1223"\w*, \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w promise|strong="G1860"\w* \w comes|strong="G1510"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*, \w so|strong="G2443"\w* \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w it|strong="G2532"\w* \w may|strong="G2532"\w* \w rest|strong="G1510"\w* \w on|strong="G1519"\w* \w grace|strong="G5485"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w may|strong="G2532"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* guaranteed \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* Abraham’s offspring—\w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w only|strong="G3440"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w those|strong="G3588"\w* \w who|strong="G3739"\w* \w are|strong="G1510"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w law|strong="G3551"\w*, \w but|strong="G2532"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w those|strong="G3588"\w* \w who|strong="G3739"\w* \w are|strong="G1510"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* Abraham. \w He|strong="G2532"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w father|strong="G3962"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w us|strong="G1519"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w*.

\w As|strong="G5613"\w* \w it|strong="G2532"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w written|strong="G1125"\w*: “\w I|strong="G3739"\w* \w have|strong="G2532"\w* \w made|strong="G5087"\w* \w you|strong="G4771"\w* \w a|strong="G5613"\w* \w father|strong="G3962"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w many|strong="G4183"\w* \w nations|strong="G1484"\w*.”\f + \fr 4:17 \ft Genesis 17:5\f* \w He|strong="G2532"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w our|strong="G2316"\w* \w father|strong="G3962"\w* \w in|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w presence|strong="G2713"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w in|strong="G2532"\w* \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w believed|strong="G4100"\w*, \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w who|strong="G3739"\w* \w gives|strong="G2227"\w* \w life|strong="G2227"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w dead|strong="G3498"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w calls|strong="G2564"\w* \w into|strong="G2564"\w* \w being|strong="G1510"\w* \w what|strong="G3739"\w* \w does|strong="G1510"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w yet|strong="G2532"\w* \w exist|strong="G1510"\w*.

\w Against|strong="G2596"\w* \w all|strong="G2596"\w* \w hope|strong="G1680"\w*, \w Abraham|strong="G4100"\w* \w in|strong="G1519"\w* \w hope|strong="G1680"\w* \w believed|strong="G4100"\w* \w and|strong="G3962"\w* \w so|strong="G3779"\w* \w became|strong="G1096"\w* \w the|strong="G1519"\w* \w father|strong="G3962"\w* \w of|strong="G3844"\w* \w many|strong="G4183"\w* \w nations|strong="G1484"\w*, \w just|strong="G2596"\w* \w as|strong="G1519"\w* \w he|strong="G3739"\w* \w had|strong="G1510"\w* \w been|strong="G1510"\w* \w told|strong="G3004"\w*, “\w So|strong="G3779"\w* \w shall|strong="G3739"\w* \w your|strong="G1909"\w* offspring \w be|strong="G1096"\w*.”\f + \fr 4:18 \ft Genesis 15:5\f*

\w Without|strong="G3361"\w* weakening \w in|strong="G2532"\w* \w his|strong="G1438"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*, \w he|strong="G2532"\w* acknowledged \w the|strong="G2532"\w* decrepitness \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w his|strong="G1438"\w* \w body|strong="G4983"\w* (\w since|strong="G3499"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w was|strong="G3588"\w* \w about|strong="G4225"\w* \w a|strong="G2532"\w* \w hundred|strong="G1541"\w* \w years|strong="G1541"\w* \w old|strong="G1541"\w*) \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* lifelessness \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w Sarah|strong="G4564"\w*’s \w womb|strong="G3388"\w*.

\w Yet|strong="G1161"\w* \w he|strong="G1161"\w* \w did|strong="G2316"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w waver|strong="G1252"\w* \w through|strong="G2316"\w* disbelief \w in|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G1519"\w* \w promise|strong="G1860"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w was|strong="G3588"\w* \w strengthened|strong="G1743"\w* \w in|strong="G1519"\w* \w his|strong="G1519"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w gave|strong="G1325"\w* \w glory|strong="G1391"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*,

\w being|strong="G1510"\w* \w fully|strong="G4135"\w* \w persuaded|strong="G4135"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w God|strong="G1861"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* \w able|strong="G1415"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w do|strong="G4160"\w* \w what|strong="G3739"\w* \w He|strong="G2532"\w* \w had|strong="G2532"\w* \w promised|strong="G1861"\w*.

\w This|strong="G1352"\w* \w is|strong="G2532"\w* \w why|strong="G1519"\w* “\w it|strong="G2532"\w* \w was|strong="G2532"\w* \w credited|strong="G3049"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w him|strong="G2532"\w* \w as|strong="G1519"\w* \w righteousness|strong="G1343"\w*.”\f + \fr 4:22 \ft Genesis 15:6\f*

\w Now|strong="G1161"\w* \w the|strong="G1161"\w* words “\w it|strong="G3754"\w* \w was|strong="G3748"\w* \w credited|strong="G3049"\w* \w to|strong="G3756"\w* \w him|strong="G3049"\w*” \w were|strong="G3748"\w* \w written|strong="G1125"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w only|strong="G3440"\w* \w for|strong="G3754"\w* Abraham,

\w but|strong="G2532"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w for|strong="G1223"\w* \w us|strong="G2249"\w*, \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* righteousness \w will|strong="G3195"\w* \w be|strong="G2532"\w* \w credited|strong="G3049"\w*—\w for|strong="G1223"\w* \w us|strong="G2249"\w* \w who|strong="G3739"\w* \w believe|strong="G4100"\w* \w in|strong="G1909"\w* \w Him|strong="G3588"\w* \w who|strong="G3739"\w* \w raised|strong="G1453"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w our|strong="G2424"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w dead|strong="G3498"\w*.

\w He|strong="G2532"\w* \w was|strong="G3588"\w* \w delivered|strong="G3860"\w* \w over|strong="G3860"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* death \w for|strong="G1223"\w* \w our|strong="G2532"\w* \w trespasses|strong="G3900"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w was|strong="G3588"\w* \w raised|strong="G1453"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* life \w for|strong="G1223"\w* \w our|strong="G2532"\w* \w justification|strong="G1347"\w*.
